def generate_dynamic_ssml(chunk):
ssml = f"""<speak version='1.0' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis' xml:lang='en-US'>"""
# å–æ¶ˆæ³¨é‡Šæ‚¨æƒ³è¦åº”ç”¨çš„æƒ…æ„Ÿ
ssml += f"<prosody pitch='+10%' rate='fast'><emphasis level='moderate'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # happy
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='+5%' rate='medium'><emphasis level='strong'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # romantic
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='+7%' rate='medium'><emphasis level='moderate'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # å……æ»¡å¸Œæœ›
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='default' rate='medium'><emphasis level='none'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # ä¸­ç«‹
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='-5%' rate='slow'><emphasis level='moderate'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # å¤±æœ›
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='-10%' rate='fast'><emphasis level='strong'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # ç”Ÿæ°”
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='-10%' rate='slow'><emphasis level='strong'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # å®³æ€•
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='-15%' rate='slow'><emphasis level='strong'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # æ‚²ä¼¤
# ssml += f"<prosody pitch='-20%' rate='very slow'><emphasis level='strong'>{chunk}</emphasis></prosody>" # devastated
ssml += "</speak>"
return ssml
